name: Chicken Dinner (Ido Adler, Ori Brusilovsky)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 72 hours. Theme: Delay The Inevitable. Please Rate Us!

You play a chicken in a coop, trying to escape the hungry farmer. Will you be able to delay the inevitable?

Control with the arrow keys/WASD

Credits:

  • Programming: Ido Adler
  • Programming and Art: Ori Brusilovsky
  • Music and SFX: Shaked Lotan
  • Font: somepx@
